bio.experienceSummary:
I'd describe my personality as fun, easy going and cheerful

I like working with kids because I love children. Love seeing their development growth and if I can have a piece of enhancing and empowering them to be great individuals then of course it's a pleasure. 

One thing you should know about me is your child is your precious jewel and my job is to keep that jewel save and treat it just as special as is.
I provide safety, care and fun to a child as I babysit. Ensuring they feel safe, comfortable to be themselves while having a wonderful time. Every child is different so I learn who they are, their personality, their likes and dislike. I am flexible and open to assisting in anyways I can. I love arts and craft, I'll play sport, I'll go on outings such as museum, park anywhere they want to go I'm willing to travel. Babysitting is not just a job but a passion.

description.originalText: Kiaora is a delightful and creative sitter who our five-year-old daughter immediately loved. We absolutely trust her to take great care of her.

bio.experienceSummary: My name is Linda and mom of two successful young women. I lost my job in March and decided to be a Nanny/Mother's helper. I have over 30 years of experience in caring for children of all ages. Love assisting children reach developmental milestones via reading, games, puzzles, arts and crafts, outdoor activities, etc. Willing to help with school work, light house work and preparing meals for the children. I am very dependable and trustworthy. I am a non-smoker, love pets and have a perfect driving record. I hope that I am the right fit for your family. Reference are available upon request.

description.originalText: Erundina (“Linda”) has been with my family for a little over three years as our full time nanny for our two boys now 4.5 and 3. She is extremely trustworthy and patient with our boys. She keeps them active, playing outside and going for walks. She comes up with fun art projects for them. She has taught them so many things, writing, numbers, letters, etc. She makes it easy not to be worried that my kids are properly cared for. She has become part of our family. Happy to answer any questions.

bio.experienceSummary:
I am a 56 years young mom. I've raised two beautiful, intelligent, witty and loving human beings. I don't sweat the small stuff and I'm a calming influence while maintaining a sense of humor and reality discipline. I know "a little about a lot of things" and I am engaging and personable.

I have worked on Wall Street for many years and have lots of experience with hiring nannies for my colleagues and myself. I have experience with children of all ages. I am phenomenal with newborns and toddlers and extremely intuitive. I love doting on them and enjoy fostering every milestone. I am also helpful with older children's schedules and homework. I have extensive experience with special needs children. ADHD and Autism.

I am reliable, responsible and trustworthy. I have a clean NYS license and my own car. I have lived at my current address for 28 years. I adore pets of all kinds.

Hi! I'm Claudia and I'm 24 years old. I have 6+ years of paid experience, I've taken care of kids from newborn to 14 years old. I'm very patient and loving, I'm comfortable with taking care of pets, meal prep, and dropping off and picking up from activities. I love play time and I'm good with arts and crafts. I did community service as an assistant in an after-school program for middle schoolers so I have a lot of experience helping out with homework and school projects. I worked at a Daycare school for 3 years as a Pre-K assistant teacher and eventually became a Preschool lead teacher. I have a driver's license with a clean record and my own car. I'm First Aid/AED/CPR certified for Adult and Pediatrics. I speak Spanish fluently. I'm fully vaccinated against Covid 19. I would be happy to help in anything I could!

description.displayText: I've hired Claudia to babysit my boys on two occasions. She is the best and my kids love her! Always arrives early and willing to stay late. She's very patient with the kids and friendly. No complaints at all!
description.originalText: I've hired Claudia to babysit my boys on two occasions. She is the best and my kids love her! Always arrives early and willing to stay late. She's very patient with the kids and friendly. No complaints at all!

bio.experienceSummary:
As a nurturing caregiver with four years of experience, I'm passionate about enriching the lives of children and supporting families. My journey in childcare began with fulfilling babysitting roles, which fueled my desire to make a positive impact on young minds.

I believe that every child deserves a safe and nurturing environment to thrive. With my patient and calm nature, I provide a stable foundation for children to learn, play, and grow. My creative and imaginative approach to childcare keeps children engaged and entertained, while my friendly and approachable demeanor fosters open communication and trust.

I prioritize clear and effective communication with parents, ensuring that they are well-informed about their child's day and any matters that arise. I adapt to the parents' preferred communication method, whether it's verbal updates during pickup or through their preferred messaging platform.

My approach to household rules is guided by the parents' wishes.

description.originalText: Breana did a great job with our two kids. We will definitely use her in the future.

bio.experienceSummary: Hi! My name is Mary and I am a graduate college student. I am looking to find a summer babysitter / nannying position. I have five+ years of experience caring for children.

description.originalText: Mary was an absolute dream and savior for us this summer! She cared for my 5 year old daughter and her two older cousins much of the summer.  She was energetic, upbeat, careful, engaging, and just so kind and warm with the kids.  They absolutely loved her and my daughter is VERY shy - she warmed right up to Mary and had a blast with her every day. They did everything from playing inside, riding bikes, playing in the pool, chatting, doing arts and crafts, etc. Mary is incredibly reliable and responsible.  I trust her immensely and wish she could be our childcare all the time! :)

bio.experienceSummary:
Hello, my name is Raquel I'm a 27 years old from Costa Rica, located in Springfield NJ
I'm a professional Dance teacher and Nanny.
Looking for a full time nanny position my availability is 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. 
I have five years and half working as a nanny for 3 different families. I also have four years of professional dance teaching experience, working for academies and private workshops. I teach my own 2yr-9yr old classes part-time in Dance innovations Chattam. 
I'm a loving and energetic nanny who is open to playing and having fun with kids, while still providing the best care and attention.
Valid driver license, legal to work in USA.
*Pediatric CPR/ First Aid/ AED certificated*
Looking for a full time job * 

Abilities
-English and Spanish language 
- Worked for Children Entertainment Parties/Dance Parties 
- Pet Friendly 
- Great at Hair Styles 
- Arts and Crafts
- diaper changing and bottle feeder
-napping training 
-manage and storage breast milk 
-patience and very lovely with Kid

I have been working with elderly people for the past 6 years and I am passionate with elderly people I believe myself to be enthusiastic, dynamic, and very flexible. I give care to my best ability and time management will help me finish all tasks given in time. I am friendly and easily approachable.

Greetings. I'm Snethemba (but you can call me Claudia). and I would like to steal a minute of your time. 

I consider myself to have a very colorful personality. I am convinced that my verifiable experience and strong abilities makes me an excellent babysitter/nanny. I'm a team player, flexible, respectful, a rule follower, I have genuine love for children.

Residing in New Jersey 
2 years au pair experience. 
Infant qualified
I have more than 4 600 hours of childcare experience at a kindergarten and I have cared for 53 children and 15 infants.
I started babysitting children from the year of 2015.
I'm fully vaccinated.
I have experience with all ages.
Clean, dependable, honest, hard-working, good listener, flexible to change, proactive nature and full of empathy.

Hi there! My name is Balasia and I am currently a senior at Rutgers University. I will be receiving my bachelors degree in Social Work, May of 2023, and I am looking for a nanny job to support me along the way!

I am very passionate about working with youth and families! Since the age of 16, I have worked in day care centers and elementary schools. Throughout my professional and academic journey, I have expanded my experience to working with middle school & high school aged children. Outside of my professional experience, I am the youngest of 7 children and I have many nieces and nephews. I am a proud aunt!

I hope that can find some time to connect & get to know more about one another!

description.displayText: Balasia was the best babysitter I've had as of yet. She's always on time and prepared for the day. Not only is she great at her job but she's extremely fun to be around even for my husband and I, very mature and professional. Sadly, we moved so the kids (ages 5-8) miss her so much already.
description.originalText: Balasia was the best babysitter I've had as of yet. She's always on time and prepared for the day. Not only is she great at her job but she's extremely fun to be around even for my husband and I, very mature and professional. Sadly, we moved so the kids (ages 5-8) miss her so much already.
